title: [Cancer] Study on 1,078,000 men, with an average age of 18 years, found that higher aerobic fitness at age 18 have a lower risk of several forms of cancer later in life, especially cancers of the gastrointestinal tract

[Medicine] Researchers have engineered bacteria that detect the presence of tumor DNA in live organisms (mice), this innovation could pave the way to new biosensors capable of identifying various infections, cancers and other diseases
